short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract numbered links, titles, and site names from Google's AI Overview answers. Download the data as a CSV file for easy analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google AI Overview Link Scraper is an essential tool for SEO professionals, content creators, and digital marketers who want to analyze Google's AI-generated search results.

Key Features:
• Extract all links from Google's AI Overview answers automatically
• Capture numbered positions to understand ranking order
• Collect site names and titles for comprehensive analysis
• Export data to CSV with a single click
• Works with expanded "Show all" results

Perfect for:
• Content Research: Understand which sources Google's AI trusts most
• Competitor Analysis: See which websites frequently appear in AI overviews
• SEO Strategy: Track your website's presence in AI-generated results
• Content Planning: Identify authoritative sources in your niche
• Link Building: Discover potential outreach opportunities

Whether you're conducting SEO research, analyzing content opportunities, or tracking AI search trends, Google AI Overview Link Scraper streamlines your workflow by automating the data collection process. It's an invaluable tool for anyone looking to understand and leverage Google's 
AI-powered search results.

Enhance your SEO research capabilities with AI Overview Link Scraper!

Note:
This extension only works on Google search results that trigger an AI Overview
Results vary based on search queries and Google's AI response
